isSelected().Description: Returns true if this tab is currently selected.

getContentDescription().Description: Gets a brief description of this tab's content for use in accessibility support.

Returns: Current position, or @B_android#support#design#widget#TabLayout#Tab#INVALID_POSITION_E@ if this tab is not currently in the action bar.
getPosition().Description: Return the current position of this tab in the action bar.

Returns: The current instance for call chaining
Parameters: int: A resource ID referring to the icon that should be displayed
setIcon(int).Description: Set the icon displayed on this tab.

getIcon().Description: Return the icon associated with this tab.

getCustomView().Description: Returns the custom view used for this tab.

Returns: The current instance for call chaining
Parameters: int: A resource ID referring to the description text
setContentDescription(int).Description: Set a description of this tab's content for use in accessibility support. If no content description is provided the title will be used.

getText().Description: Return the text of this tab.

Returns: The current instance for call chaining
Parameters: Drawable: The drawable to use as an icon
setIcon(android.graphics.drawable.Drawab.Description: Set the icon displayed on this tab.

Returns: The current instance for call chaining
setTag(java.lang.Object).Description: Give this Tab an arbitrary object to hold for later use.

Returns: The current instance for call chaining
Parameters: int: A layout resource to inflate and use as a custom tab view
setCustomView(int).Description: Set a custom view to be used for this tab. If the inflated layout contains a @B_android#widget#TextView_E@ with an ID of @B_android#R#id#text1_E@ then that will be updated with the value given to @B_android#support#design#widget#TabLayout#Tab#setText_E@. Similarly, if this layout contains an @B_android#widget#ImageView_E@ with ID @B_android#R#id#icon_E@ then it will be updated with the value given to @B_android#support#design#widget#TabLayout#Tab#setIcon_E@.

Returns: The current instance for call chaining
Parameters: View: Custom view to be used as a tab.
setCustomView(android.view.View).Description: Set a custom view to be used for this tab. If the provided view contains a @B_android#widget#TextView_E@ with an ID of @B_android#R#id#text1_E@ then that will be updated with the value given to @B_android#support#design#widget#TabLayout#Tab#setText_E@. Similarly, if this layout contains an @B_android#widget#ImageView_E@ with ID @B_android#R#id#icon_E@ then it will be updated with the value given to @B_android#support#design#widget#TabLayout#Tab#setIcon_E@.

Returns: The current instance for call chaining
Parameters: CharSequence: Description of this tab's content
setContentDescription(java.lang.CharSequ.Description: Set a description of this tab's content for use in accessibility support. If no content description is provided the title will be used.

select().Description: Select this tab. Only valid if the tab has been added to the action bar.

Returns: The current instance for call chaining
setText(java.lang.CharSequence).Description: Set the text displayed on this tab. Text may be truncated if there is not room to display the entire string.

Returns: The current instance for call chaining
Parameters: int: A resource ID referring to the text that should be displayed
setText(int).Description: Set the text displayed on this tab. Text may be truncated if there is not room to display the entire string.
